SQLSelect.Command:
select pdl.IDPROCESS_L, pl.PROCESS, pl.PROCESS as PROCESSDISPLAYNAME, pl.IDSTPROCESS as IDSTPROCESS, pl.DTSTPROCESS as DTSTPROCESS, pl.IDDATAIDENT, pl.IDDATA, pl.IDA, pl.HOSTNAME, pl.APPNAME, pl.APPVERSION, pdl.IDPROCESSDET_L, pdl.PROCESS as PROCESSDET, pdl.PROCESS as PROCESSDETDISPLAYNAME, isnull(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS,pdl.IDSTPROCESS) as IDSTPROCESSDET, pdl.DTSTPROCESS as DTSTPROCESSDET, case when pdl.SEQNO is null then pdl.IDPROCESSDET_L else pdl.SEQNO end as SEQNO, case when pl.PROCESS = pdl.PROCESS then '0' || pl.PROCESS else case pdl.PROCESS when 'EVENTSGEN' then '1' when 'EVENTSVAL' then '2' when 'CIGEN' then '3' when 'SIGEN' then '4' when 'ACCOUNTGEN' then '5' end || pl.PROCESS end as ORDERPROCESS, case when smd.SYSCODE is null and smd_gb.SYSCODE is null then pdl.MESSAGE else case when sm.SYSCODE = 'LOG' then '' else sm.SYSCODE || '-' || right('00000' || convert(varchar,sm.SYSNUMBER),5) || ': ' end || replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE), '{1}',isnull(pdl.DATA1,'{1}')), '{2}',isnull(pdl.DATA2,'{2}')), '{3}',isnull(pdl.DATA3,'{3}')), '{4}',isnull(pdl.DATA4,'{4}')), '{5}',isnull(pdl.DATA5,'{5}')), '{6}',isnull(pdl.DATA6,'{6}')), '{7}',isnull(pdl.DATA7,'{7}')), '{8}',isnull(pdl.DATA8,'{8}')), '{9}',isnull(pdl.DATA9,'{9}')), '{10}',isnull(pdl.DATA10,'{10}')) || case when pdl.MESSAGE is null then '' else '
' || pdl.MESSAGE end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{1}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA1,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA1IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA1IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA1 || '' end end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{2}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA2,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA2IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA2IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA2 || '' end end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{3}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA3,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA3IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA3IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA3 || '' end end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{4}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA4,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA4IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA4IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA4 || '' end end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{5}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA5,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA5IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA5IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA5 || '' end end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{6}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA6,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA6IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA6IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA6 || '' end end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{7}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA7,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA7IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA7IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA7 || '' end end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{8}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA8,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA8IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA8IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA8 || '' end end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{9}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA9,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA9IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA9IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA9 || '' end end || case when isnull(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{10}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA10,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA10IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA10IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA10 || '' end end end as MESSAGE, isnull(pdl.SYSCODE || '-' || right('00000' || convert(varchar,pdl.SYSNUMBER),5), 'n/a') as CODE, pdl.IDDATA as IDDATADET, pdl.IDDATAIDENT as IDDATAIDENTDET, pdl.DATA1,pdl.DATA2,pdl.DATA3,pdl.DATA4,pdl.DATA5, pdl.DATA6,pdl.DATA7,pdl.DATA8,pdl.DATA9,pdl.DATA10, pdl.DATA1IDENT,pdl.DATA2IDENT,pdl.DATA3IDENT,pdl.DATA4IDENT,pdl.DATA5IDENT, pdl.DATA6IDENT,pdl.DATA7IDENT,pdl.DATA8IDENT,pdl.DATA9IDENT,pdl.DATA10IDENT, pdl.LEVELORDER, pdl.EXTLLINK,pdl.ROWATTRIBUT, /*pdl.ROWVERSION,*/ pl.IDTRK_L, --PL 20210423 case when isnull(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS, pdl.IDSTPROCESS) in ('CRITICAL','ERROR') then 1 else isnull(sm.ISSHOWONERROR, 0) end as ISSHOWONERROR, case when isnull(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS, pdl.IDSTPROCESS) in ('CRITICAL','ERROR') then 1 when isnull(sm.ISSHOWONERROR, 0) = 0 then 0 else (select min(1) from dbo.PROCESSDET_L pd_err where pd_err.IDSTPROCESS in ('CRITICAL','ERROR') and pd_err.IDPROCESS_L=pl.IDPROCESS_L) end as ISSHOWONERROR, --PL 20210423 case when isnull(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS, pdl.IDSTPROCESS) in ('CRITICAL','ERROR','WARNING') then 1 else isnull(sm.ISSHOWONERROR, 0) end as ISSHOWONWARNING case when isnull(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS, pdl.IDSTPROCESS) in ('CRITICAL','ERROR','WARNING') then 1 when isnull(sm.ISSHOWONERROR, 0) = 0 then 0 else (select min(1) from dbo.PROCESSDET_L pd_wng where pd_wng.IDSTPROCESS in ('CRITICAL','ERROR','WARNING') and pd_wng.IDPROCESS_L=pl.IDPROCESS_L) end as ISSHOWONWARNING from dbo.TRACKER_L t inner join dbo.PROCESS_L pl on (pl.IDTRK_L = t.IDTRK_L) inner join dbo.PROCESSDET_L pdl on (pdl.IDPROCESS_L = pl.IDPROCESS_L) left outer join dbo.PROCESSDET_L pdlg on (pdlg.IDPROCESS_L = pdl.IDPROCESS_L) and (pdlg.PROCESS = pdl.PROCESS) and (pdlg.OSPID = pdl.OSPID) and (pdlg.GRPNO = pdl.SEQNO) and (pdlg.THREADID = pdl.THREADID) --PL 20210423 left outer join dbo.SYSTEMMSG sm on (sm.SYSCODE = pdl.SYSCODE) and (sm.SYSNUMBER = pdl.SYSNUMBER) left outer join dbo.SYSTEMMSGDET smd on (smd.SYSCODE = sm.SYSCODE) and (smd.SYSNUMBER = sm.SYSNUMBER) and (smd.CULTURE = '%%CULTURE_USER_ISO3166_ALPHA2%%') left outer join dbo.SYSTEMMSGDET smd_gb on (smd_gb.SYSCODE = sm.SYSCODE) and (smd_gb.SYSNUMBER = sm.SYSNUMBER) and (smd_gb.CULTURE = 'en')

select pdl.IDPROCESS_L, pl.PROCESS, pl.PROCESS as PROCESSDISPLAYNAME, pl.IDSTPROCESS as IDSTPROCESS, pl.DTSTPROCESS as DTSTPROCESS, pl.IDDATAIDENT, pl.IDDATA, pl.IDA, pl.HOSTNAME, pl.APPNAME, pl.APPVERSION, pdl.IDPROCESSDET_L, pdl.PROCESS as PROCESSDET, pdl.PROCESS as PROCESSDETDISPLAYNAME, isnull(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS,pdl.IDSTPROCESS) as IDSTPROCESSDET, pdl.DTSTPROCESS as DTSTPROCESSDET, case when pdl.SEQNO is null then pdl.IDPROCESSDET_L else pdl.SEQNO end as SEQNO, case when pl.PROCESS = pdl.PROCESS then '0' || pl.PROCESS else case pdl.PROCESS when 'EVENTSGEN' then '1' when 'EVENTSVAL' then '2' when 'CIGEN' then '3' when 'SIGEN' then '4' when 'ACCOUNTGEN' then '5' end || pl.PROCESS end as ORDERPROCESS, case when smd.SYSCODE is null and smd_gb.SYSCODE is null then to_clob(pdl.MESSAGE) else case when sm.SYSCODE = 'LOG' then '' else sm.SYSCODE || '-' || substr('00000' || to_char(sm.SYSNUMBER),-5) || ': ' end || replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace( nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE), '{1}',nvl(pdl.DATA1,'{1}')), '{2}',nvl(pdl.DATA2,'{2}')), '{3}',nvl(pdl.DATA3,'{3}')), '{4}',nvl(pdl.DATA4,'{4}')), '{5}',nvl(pdl.DATA5,'{5}')), '{6}',nvl(pdl.DATA6,'{6}')), '{7}',nvl(pdl.DATA7,'{7}')), '{8}',nvl(pdl.DATA8,'{8}')), '{9}',nvl(pdl.DATA9,'{9}')), '{10}',nvl(pdl.DATA10,'{10}')) || case when pdl.MESSAGE is null then to_clob('') else '
' || to_clob(pdl.MESSAGE) end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{1}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA1,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA1IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA1IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA1 || '' end end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{2}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA2,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA2IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA2IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA2 || '' end end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{3}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA3,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA3IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA3IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA3 || '' end end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{4}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA4,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA4IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA4IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA4 || '' end end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{5}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA5,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA5IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA5IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA5 || '' end end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{6}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA6,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA6IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA6IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA6 || '' end end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{7}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA7,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA7IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA7IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA7 || '' end end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{8}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA8,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA8IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA8IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA8 || '' end end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{9}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA9,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA9IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA9IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA9 || '' end end || case when nvl(smd.MESSAGE,smd_gb.MESSAGE) like '%{10}%' then '' else case when nullif(pdl.DATA10,'') is null then '' else '
' || case when nullif(pdl.DATA10IDENT,'') is null then '' else pdl.DATA10IDENT || ': ' end || '' || pdl.DATA10 || '' end end end as MESSAGE, case when pdl.SYSCODE is null then 'n/a' else pdl.SYSCODE || '-' || substr('00000' || to_char(pdl.SYSNUMBER),-5) end as CODE, pdl.IDDATA as IDDATADET, pdl.IDDATAIDENT as IDDATAIDENTDET, pdl.DATA1,pdl.DATA2,pdl.DATA3,pdl.DATA4,pdl.DATA5, pdl.DATA6,pdl.DATA7,pdl.DATA8,pdl.DATA9,pdl.DATA10, pdl.DATA1IDENT,pdl.DATA2IDENT,pdl.DATA3IDENT,pdl.DATA4IDENT,pdl.DATA5IDENT, pdl.DATA6IDENT,pdl.DATA7IDENT,pdl.DATA8IDENT,pdl.DATA9IDENT,pdl.DATA10IDENT, pdl.LEVELORDER, pdl.EXTLLINK,pdl.ROWATTRIBUT, /*pdl.ROWVERSION,*/ pl.IDTRK_L, --PL 20210423 case when nvl(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS, pdl.IDSTPROCESS) in ('CRITICAL','ERROR') then 1 else nvl(sm.ISSHOWONERROR, 0) end as ISSHOWONERROR, case when nvl(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS, pdl.IDSTPROCESS) in ('CRITICAL','ERROR') then 1 when nvl(sm.ISSHOWONERROR, 0) = 0 then 0 else (select min(1) from dbo.PROCESSDET_L pd_err where pd_err.IDSTPROCESS in ('CRITICAL','ERROR') and pd_err.IDPROCESS_L=pl.IDPROCESS_L) end as ISSHOWONERROR, --PL 20210423 case when nvl(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS, pdl.IDSTPROCESS) in ('CRITICAL','ERROR','WARNING') then 1 else nvl(sm.ISSHOWONERROR, 0) end as ISSHOWONWARNING case when nvl(pdlg.IDSTPROCESS, pdl.IDSTPROCESS) in ('CRITICAL','ERROR','WARNING') then 1 when nvl(sm.ISSHOWONERROR, 0) = 0 then 0 else (select min(1) from dbo.PROCESSDET_L pd_wng where pd_wng.IDSTPROCESS in ('CRITICAL','ERROR','WARNING') and pd_wng.IDPROCESS_L=pl.IDPROCESS_L) end as ISSHOWONWARNING from dbo.TRACKER_L t inner join dbo.PROCESS_L pl on (pl.IDTRK_L = t.IDTRK_L) inner join dbo.PROCESSDET_L pdl on (pdl.IDPROCESS_L = pl.IDPROCESS_L) left outer join dbo.PROCESSDET_L pdlg on (pdlg.IDPROCESS_L = pdl.IDPROCESS_L) and (pdlg.PROCESS = pdl.PROCESS) and (pdlg.OSPID = pdl.OSPID) and (pdlg.GRPNO = pdl.SEQNO) and (pdlg.THREADID = pdl.THREADID) --PL 20210423 left outer join dbo.SYSTEMMSG sm on (sm.SYSCODE = pdl.SYSCODE) and (sm.SYSNUMBER = pdl.SYSNUMBER) left outer join dbo.SYSTEMMSGDET smd on (smd.SYSCODE = sm.SYSCODE) and (smd.SYSNUMBER = sm.SYSNUMBER) and (smd.CULTURE = '%%CULTURE_USER_ISO3166_ALPHA2%%') left outer join dbo.SYSTEMMSGDET smd_gb on (smd_gb.SYSCODE = sm.SYSCODE) and (smd_gb.SYSNUMBER = sm.SYSNUMBER) and (smd_gb.CULTURE = 'en')

Referential.SQLRowStyle: 'DataGrid-' || IDSTPROCESSDET || '_2' || case when LEVELORDER is not null then ' LVL' || convert(varchar,LEVELORDER) when LEVELORDER is null and tblmain.ROWATTRIBUT is null then ' LVL2' end
